title: 为什么我上MCBBS老是超时？
txt_content: 你们都会超时吗？ 老是要刷新 纠结死了

replies.author: Wolverine
replies.txt_content: 晚上的话，应该不会发生这种情况的啊？

replies.author: zouchanglin
replies.txt_content: 现在根本没超时过了。

replies.author: Falling_空城
replies.txt_content: 感觉有些时候论坛不稳定。。昨天硬是没登上去

replies.author: 山鸡
replies.txt_content: 除非是在人多的时候 MCBBS的服务器承受不住压力   夜里的话貌似没有太大的可能

replies.author: VIP—月光指揮官
replies.txt_content: 晚上会超时吗？不可能吧

replies.author: 独孤粽
replies.txt_content: ？这个时段一点也不卡啊？早上倒是经常

replies.author: HC20011015
replies.txt_content: 不会啊,一般时间多会卡爆,晚上八点多也是卡爆!

replies.author: shuaohao38
replies.txt_content:
经常会
因为人多

replies.author: Smaoll
replies.txt_content:
{:10_492:}一般情况下 mcbbs不是抽了就是大姨妈了
当夜深人静的时候 mcbbs就不会了 人少嘛{:10_492:}

replies.author: Umikaze
replies.txt_content: 论坛服务器负荷过大

replies.author: Ayamuta
replies.txt_content:
昨天有
现在没了

replies.author: 鱼青余
replies.txt_content: 6点~8点貌似是这样的

replies.author: Banyg
replies.txt_content: 错开早高峰就好了··

replies.author: gggbbb
replies.txt_content: 凌晨上BBS，绝对不会502

replies.author: a993093644
replies.txt_content: 人多了

replies.author: 小黑lol
replies.txt_content: 现在没了（之前老是502啊啊啊啊啊啊){:10_512:}

replies.author: AanDi熊
replies.txt_content: 不会是网速的问题

replies.author: 武王撞钟
replies.txt_content: 不时504timegateway

replies.author: Love_凌夏
replies.txt_content: 提示: 作者被禁止或删除 内容自动屏蔽

replies.author: MC麒麟
replies.txt_content: 才是个超时而已，502 504 server is too busy都见过了！

replies.author: SuperMman
replies.txt_content: 星期五星期六会，其他时间段不会吧，。

replies.author: miccn丶紫琅
replies.txt_content: 蛋疼，12M网络都502
现在很神奇地不卡

replies.author: ljt1234567
replies.txt_content: 弱弱地问一句：为毛我家玩不了整合包！！！！！！！！！！！{:10_566:}！点了启动游戏就没了！！{:10_528:}
